title: Contemporary Luxury Apartment with Private Garden in Suburb, Nowy Sącz
description: Discover refined living in this exquisitely renovated, ground-floor apartment featuring 3 spacious bedrooms and 2 modern bathrooms across 122 sqm. Expansive floor-to-ceiling windows bathe every room with natural light, seamlessly connecting indoor upscale comforts with a beautifully landscaped private garden. This premium property offers refined entertaining zones—including a barbecue area—and a state-of-the-art smart home system for unparalleled privacy and convenience. Air conditioning, elevator access, and elegant finishes throughout ensure lasting value and timeless style.
neighborhood_description: Situated in Nowy Sącz’s sought-after Suburb, this property is set within a newly established, modern enclave prioritizing green zones and pet-friendly spaces. Residents enjoy a quiet yet trendy neighborhood atmosphere, defined by harmonious architectural design and sensible development. With highway access ensuring swift transit, the area generously blends serene suburban charm with dynamic growth potential, perfect for an evolving lifestyle.
target_buyer: The ideal buyer is a discerning property investor seeking a premium, low-maintenance asset with guaranteed wide appeal—either as a luxurious personal residence or an attractive, upmarket rental property.
market_positioning: This exclusive designer residence positions itself at the pinnacle of Nowy Sącz’s suburban apartment market, offering investors rare modern garden apartments with upscale amenities and significant long-term growth prospects.
